definitions.body: pl. [[הַדְּבָקִים]] appendages of breastplate (?) 1Ki 22:34 = 2Ch 18:33 [[ובין הַשִּׁרְיׇן]] ´[[בֵּין הַדּ]]. (The Be al. cf. VB: the jointed attachment or appendage to the rigid breast-armour, which covered the abdomen; > Klo prop. appendage of helmet; Thes suggests armpits, lit. joints (cf. [[מַדְבְּקֵי יׇד]] Je 38:12 Targum); Ew the soft muscles etc. connecting the chest with the bottom of the back.)
